a.n: THE FORCE OF THE SEA - SOCIAL

p.k: Power of the Sea is a documentary series that reveals the special features of each one of the wonderful seas of Chile, generating conscience of the need to protect their oceanographic processes and its biodiversity. Through this 7 episodes we will live passionate adventures, sailing through the productive seas of the north; the lonely fiords and the canals of the extreme south; the insular waters full of endemic creatures. We investigated its energetic potential and the strength that moves the fisherman and scientists to challenge the sea and discover its secrets.
